official_title: To provide an 8 percent pay increase for Federal employees within the San Diego, CA Metropolitan Statistical Area.

summary.text: Grants General Schedule employees in the San Diego, California, Metropolitan Statistical Area an eight percent interim geographic pay increase as provided to other Geneal Schedule employees in certain high cost-of-living areas under the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990.

titles.title: To provide an 8 percent pay increase for Federal employees within the San Diego, CA Metropolitan Statistical Area.
